diff_act: 1.display all database tables except log tables
2.allow modification of all database tables except log tables

regen.new_specification: The system shall prevent modification of log tables and provide an error message when a user attempts to modify them.
The system shall prevent modification of log tables to ensure data integrity and security.

regen.absent_element: exclusion of log tables from modification
regen.new_specification: The system shall prevent modification of log tables in the database.

label: It shall allow modification of all database tables with the exception of log tables
